title: Corporate body font?
content:
any recommendations for body/subhead text combo for a corporate brochure.  
client supplied a dell brochure for reference and it uses a sans serif for body text,  
unfortunately the client’s brochure has a lot more body text, three full pages at three columns each.

I’ve tested Myriad for a sans, but then went with a used serif: Minion for economical reasons,

I’m wondering if there’s a serif that reflects, corporate and technology more than Minion and legible at 8-9 points. I have to use a font from bitstream.

the brochure is going to internal coporate managers to push the companies IT guys, hence technology.

any suggestions very much appreciated from you smart people!

If you reconcider, have a look at MAC Rhino Fonts...

It’s a freelance project for an Ad agency that specifically wants to keep the budget down, therefore they have enforced usage of Fonts that they have a license to use. Unfortunately, Bitstream the ripper is it :(
